enWisdom: Wastefulness is the symbol [and cause] of poverty

Wisdom: الْحَازِمُ مَنْ تَجَنَّبَ التَّبْذِيرَ وَعَافَ السَّرَفَ
enWisdom: The judicious is one who eschews extravagance and loathes waste

Wisdom: عَلَيْكَ بِتَرْكِ التَّبْذِيرِ وَالْإِسْرَافِ وَالتَّخَلُّقِ بِالْعَدْلِ وَالْإِنْصَافِ
enWisdom: You must abandon wastefulness and extravagance, and adopt the qualities of justice and equity
Wastefulness is enough of an extravagance
Be open-handed but do not be wasteful
One who takes pride in wastefulness will be humiliated by indigence

Wisdom: مِنَ الْعَقْلِ مُجَانَبَةُ التَّبْذِيرِ وَحُسْنُ التَّدْبِيرِ
enWisdom: Keeping away from wastefulness and good management [skills] are from [the fruits of] intelligence

Wisdom: مِنْ أَشْرَفِ الشَّرَفِ الْكَفُّ عَنِ التَّبْذِيرِ وَالسَّرَفِ

enWisdom: There is no ignorance like wastefulness
